name: node-jquery
description: set up jQuery and DOM tree on node
readme:
# node-jquery
Provide `window`, `jQuery` and `$` to node integrating `jquery`, `jsdom` and `xmlhttprequest`.

## How to use

Let's say you use npm, add "node-jquery" to dependencies section of package.js

    require("node-jquery")

You can access like this

    window.document
    body = $("body")

Also `$.ajax`, too.

    $.ajax({
      method: 'get',
      url: 'http://www.yahoo.com',
      success: function(r) {
        console.log(r);
      }
    });

## History
### 0.1.1  
- support $.ajax using xmlhttprequest

### 0.1.0  
- first release
